website_summaries.verdict: They’re not the most popular, but these gentle wipes are eco-friendly right down to the packaging and they’re flushable too.
pros: Organic aloe vera soothes and hydrates
Cotton construction lends these wipes a soft, cloth-like texture
Complies with federal guidelines for flushability and septic safety
Biodegradable and packaged in recycled materials
cons: Removing just one wipe is a challenge
Might still clog delicate plumbing systems

customer_reviews.title: Happy paws, tooshies, and toilets!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only minimal-ingredient wet wipes that are point blankly flushable. I used to use the Honest Co. wipes, but I suspected they weren’t supposed to be flushed, even though nothing on the package stated otherwise. I decided to reprieve my septic system and try Happy Little Camper, and I’ve fully switched over to these wipes. They’re a good size for adult and dog-paw use, and I’ve never had issues with them tearing in either situation. Although I wish they were a little more wet, the peace of mind for my septic system is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbell Bunny

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes, they are flushable (I have been using for quite awhile and flushing without any problems) and I feel are safer to use than other wipes because of safer ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My son (4) has sensitive skin and when he used diapers we used an expensive organic wetwipe, it was the only one that didnt cause rash and met my standards, now that hes potty trained flushing those wipes is not an option so i needed a flushable wipe with similar ingredients as the wet wipes. Hes been using these for 4 months and no rash or allergic reaction:) my only complaint is that I wish these were weter. The baby wipes we use are so wet I refer to them as juicy, but these flushable wipes are dry and I end up adding some filtered water directly into the pack to get them more moisturerized.
customer_reviews.author: Steve T.

customer_reviews.title: So I gave these a try and the girls are fine with it
customer_reviews.text: All three of my girls are allergic to most wipes and forever been Using water wipes, price tag on those is high and they’re not flushable. So I gave these a try and the girls are fine with it, I like that they are flushable . (When selecting wipes make sure it’s the flushable kind, if that’s what your looking for, they do have non flushable ones as well) my only complaint reason why they don’t get five stars, they are a pain to pull out. Like crazy difficult to get a wipe out. Please make a better desig, so we don’t all have to sufffer from this huge flaw! Thank you Tired mama of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was searching for---safe yet effective wipes. The size and thickness of these make them especially useful. They're not too wet nor are they too dry. Love they have no fragrance & are not full of chemicals. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: NMGal

customer_reviews.title: Nice size wipes but doesn’t dispense easily.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size wipe, but doesn’t dispense easily. The closure was too tight on the first pack and easier on the second pack. Not consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S Long

customer_reviews.title: Not Flushable!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money! First, they clogged a new toilet...so flushable they are not. Second, they're very small wipes, so less is not more. Third, they're rather dry. I tried switching from Water Wipes (since these claimed to be flushable)... big mistake; I will go back to the trusty 'ol Water Wipes. Save your money...buy a different wipe!
customer_reviews.author: muckmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Natural choice
customer_reviews.text: Bamboo texture with aloe like description says, not the smoothest but effective.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Natural wipes
customer_reviews.text: I love that these wipes are natural and have aloe as an ingredient. However when I received the package the hard plastic piece supposed to be attached and glued on was detached from item when I unboxed it. I suppose I just got a defective one. Otherwise this product is great. No chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: Dried out. I probably won’t try to buy these again regardless though because they are kind of thick and I don’t want to clog the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: terry foster

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive, Thick, Good Size, Will Buy Again
customer_reviews.text: Started using these during potty training about a month ago and will keep using them. Helps us prevent rash. Cleans very well and leaves hiney dry. Great size and thick enough you can fold over to use two or three times depending on the mess you're wiping. They are so soft and sensitive I also use them to wipe off my eye makeup each night. We will keep buying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too dry
customer_reviews.text: These don’t have enough moisture to them. In every other way they are fine, but they are too dry.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money....
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what happened to my pack of wipes but they came with brown spots all over them ....
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kufalk

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Really does the job! Feels wonderful on skin and doesnt leave residue! Only downside that doesn’t really matter with stars is that sometimes its hard to pull out the wipes because they are stuck in their folding.
customer_reviews.author: Perica Zeba

customer_reviews.title: Great flushable no chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes for my 5 years old and the rest of my family. Great quality and only toddler flush wipes with no chemicals I have found.
customer_reviews.author: JennyD

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: They don’t tear like other flushable wet wipes I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Motaghedi

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Work awesome. Very gentle. Good for kids and adults. Flushable too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wilfinger

customer_reviews.title: Add Water
customer_reviews.text: I like that the wipes come a bit dry because I add filtered water to the package and let it sit overnight. Let me tell ya, they turn out perfect. They’re amazing for cleaning doggy paws.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard. Difficult to get out of package. Dries quickly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nita L

customer_reviews.title: Nice wipes
customer_reviews.text: Safe, gentle wipes. We like them. Strong too! And when you pull, you don't get half the package along with the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Work Well - Fall Apart
customer_reviews.text: These are great except for the part that these fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Dehling

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: These are not good. All came mostly dried out and do not feel great. Would t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to have a flushable wipe that is not full ...
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have a flushable wipe that is not full of chemicals!! It's also nice and mild smelling too.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Gentle and NO irritation!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and gentle. I had no problems with flushing them like some other reviewers, that being said however, I only flushed no more than two at a time. Used on very sensitive skin with no issues whatsoever. I like to take them with us on car trips for the whole family to use and they travel nicely and work well. I also want to add that we had originally tried the Costco Kirkland Personal Wipes for us adults, and they caused irritation. These wipes cause no irritation to the adults at all! Yay!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had fungus growing under seal.
customer_reviews.text: All 3 packs had brown fungus/mold growing under the sticker seal. And the seal was lifted. I thought maybe it was dried glue on the first one & used a few wipes. Noticed they had yellow discoloring & stopped. Opened the other packs to find worse mold. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wipe for sensitive skin!! Even adult skin!
customer_reviews.text: Let’s talk wipes. I’ve tried them all! Most cause skin irritation on my bootie and nobody likes that!! I started Looking for natural kind or organic wipes. And thanks to amazon I found These. I but Them in bulk and have been using them for about a year now!! Rash free!! Bootie is happy!! The ones that are septic safe are the best so you feel good flushing them!
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Lid not aligned
customer_reviews.text: The snap-closed lid on my package of wipes was not stuck on correctly, so there is a gap that allows air into the package, dries out the top wipes and yellows the color. Hard to tell what the quality of the wipes would be like in the absence of this production defect. Won’t order this kind again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Leima

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting brown crust inside
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting brown crust directly under the seal. This was the second pack. Tossing them out. Serious quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: We like them.
customer_reviews.text: We like these wipes overall. The pack is bigger than others we’ve used and they seem soft enough and they’re very thick. Because if their thickness I did not try flushing them yet but they seem to cause less irritation so I think we’ll consider using them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Contaminated with something
customer_reviews.text: The wipes were contaminated with a brown-colored substance when we we opened the seal. This is our first time ordering the flushable wipes.
customer_reviews.author: KAK

customer_reviews.title: Problem
customer_reviews.text: Did not feed out of the pack properly so that I had to dig around to get each sheet-- then often two came out. Very annoying feed but otherwise gentle with a pleasant fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: Need to be clearer on description. 15$ for ONE LITTLE PKG OF WIPES!!!!! I expected I was paying for a bulk supply for that price. I can buy 12 pkgs of wipes for bulk anywhere for less than 15$!!!! Total rip off! Not happy at all!!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Really like these wipes
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes, perfect for sensitive skin. They are sometimes hard to get out of the package though. I think they are a bit expensive too but I still buy them as they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find flushable wipes.
customer_reviews.text: I figure children have safer items so I try to use them instead of adult wipes. These are excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Collins

customer_reviews.title: Gross!! What is this?
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pack i opened of the three pack and it has an unknown stain!
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: As described...wish they were sturdier and didn’t stick together at times but it is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are soft and strong. I also like that they realize to keep from drying out. Great for trips.
customer_reviews.author: Grainne

customer_reviews.title: Others are better
customer_reviews.text: Smell a little funky. Easy to dry out. Very difficult to remove from dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: April Grace Baker

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again and again
customer_reviews.text: Durable, gentle, absorbent with a pleasant smell. Easy to pull out of the package. My little ones tushy is very happy and she has been sensitive to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Adults
customer_reviews.text: Adults: we use these as wipes along with toilet tissue.
customer_reviews.author: BAG

customer_reviews.title: That they are as organic as they can possibly be!
customer_reviews.text: They clean well but I find they dry out very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Rlote

customer_reviews.title: Buy on company site, not here
customer_reviews.text: I really liked them, but pretty expensive. I just found out they are double the price on Amazon vs the company site. 8.99 for 3 packs of 50. Hurray!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Safe, non-toxic flushable bathroom wipes
customer_reviews.text: There are so many toxic ingredients in commercial wipes. I have used a few in my day. But I'm so glad to have found these! I've already purchased it twice!. I know it says Baby Wipes, but my whole family uses it (my baby is 21! LOL) Safe ingredients and it's flushable. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Montee

customer_reviews.title: Only one pack, expensive
customer_reviews.text: From the price, and the picture, I assumed I would be getting two packs. I obviously ordered in a hurry, and was surprised when I got only one pack of flushable wipes for $10. The Babyganics kids flushable wipes come in a 3 pack for the same price. Haven't tried them out yet but I can't see a flushable wipe being that much better to justify the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

product_meta.title: Happy Little Camper Natural Flushable Wet Wipes with Aloe Vera and Vitamin E, Chlorine-Free, Unscented, Gentle, Hypoallergenic and Dermatologically Tested, Septic Safe, 150 Count
product_meta.description: Happy Little Campers natural baby wipes with aloe vera are non-toxic, fragrance free, alcohol free and chemical free to protect your newborn baby and toddlers sensitive skin. Our unscented hypoallergenic baby wipes are free from harmful chemicals and dyes and pure, gentle and safe for babies, toddlers and children. Ultra-soft and absorbent baby wipes for an easy, one-wipe clean. All Happy Little Camper wipes are free from animal origin ingredients.
feature_bullets: HYPOALLERGENIC - dermatologically tested, gentle formula with skin conditioning ingredients designed to reduce the risk of irritation or allergic reaction.
ALOE VERA - protect your baby’s sensitive skin with ultra-soft wipes enriched with soothing aloe vera.
NON-TOXIC - our products are free from dyes, fragrances, optical brighteners, alcohol, chlorine, parabens, PET and other harmful chemicals.

MOTHER NATURE APPROVED - we are committed to sustainable manufacturing practices, and packaging made from 40% recycled materials. We use 100% biodegradable and compostable cotton, free of optical brighteners and totally chlorine free.

WE LOVE NATURAL - The Cleanest, Greenest wipe on the market. Made from naturally absorbent 100% pulp, we select the purest GMO-free , non synthetic ingredients for our products and our CLEAN SOLUTION we select the purest ingredients for our products.
TOTALLY FLUSHABLE - Our wipes are INDA & EDANA compliant and feature rapid disintegration whilst maintaining excellent strength when wet. SEWER and SEPTIC SYSTEM SAFE.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
